xwikidoc.title: Java test: Runnable and Throwable
xwikidoc.content:
{{info}}**Question:** Runnable and Throwable are:
1. reserved words 1. two classes 1. two interfaces 1. a class and an interface, respectively 1. an interface and a class, respectively{{/info}}
